summary_text: Mahmut and Abidin work as comedians at a night club, Mahmut is honest yet Abidin is sly. Sulo brings a deaf and dumb girl named Kumru, to working the night club, but the club owner sends ...                See full summary »

name: The Blade
summary_text: After the master of the Sharp Manufacturer saber factory abdicates and appoints On, his least popular worker, as his successor, On, unwilling to lead his surly colleagues, embarks on a ...                See full summary »

name: Saved by the Bell: Wedding in Las Vegas
summary_text: In this conclusion of the long running series it finally happens: Kelly and Zack will marry. Zack's parents are against the early commitment and Kelly's parents can't afford it, so only the...                See full summary »

name: Battling Butler
summary_text: A love-struck weakling must pretend to be boxer in order to gain respect from the family of the girl he loves.

name: Jhoom Barabar Jhoom
summary_text: A crazy love story full of lies, deceits and a complicated quadrangle where each one has to think quickly and dance around each other's emotions.

name: Spiral
summary_text: A young pathologist seeks answers to the mysterious death of a friend and soon comes into contact with the same cursed videotape that caused the death of the friend's wife and son, which is haunted by the curse of Sadako, a relentless spirit.

name: Andover
summary_text: A genetics professor clones his dead wife, over and over, in a desperate attempt to get her back exactly as she was.

name: Murphy's War
summary_text: A lone survivor from a British naval ship is obsessed with getting revenge on a German U-boat crew that massacred his shipmates in the water.

name: Marjaavaan
summary_text: Raghu and Zoya are enjoying their lives together until a gang leader with harmful intentions turns their world upside down.

name: The Ornithologist
summary_text: Fernando, a solitary ornithologist, is looking for black storks when he is swept away by the rapids. Rescued by a couple of Chinese pilgrims, he plunges into an eerie and dark forest, trying to get back on his track.

name: Elsa & Fred
summary_text: A withdrawn senior experiences life in new ways when he begins spending time with the free-spirited woman who lives across the hall.

name: To Kill a King
summary_text: A recounting of the relationship between General Fairfax and Oliver Cromwell, as they try to cope with the consequences of deposing King Charles I.

name: The Hired Hand
summary_text: Harry returns home to his wife and farm after drifting with his friend Arch and has to make a difficult decision regarding his loyalties.

name: Dead Season
summary_text: When a worldwide viral outbreak leads to a plague of zombies scouring the earth for the living, two survivors flee the chaos of America to a remote island, hoping for a chance to start a ...                See full summary »

name: Oleanna
summary_text: When a student visits her professor to discuss how she failed his course, the discussion takes an awkward turn.

name: Anzio
summary_text: One of WWII's bloodiest battles as the Allies smash through the German lines which have enclosed the Anzio beachhead. Four months and 30,000 casualties before the Allies finally march to Rome.

name: Nae-bu-ja-deul
summary_text: A former political henchman seeks out revenge for being dropped by a ruthless politician while a determined investigator tries to find proof of a connection between the two of them.

name: The Bride
summary_text: As the Bride and the Groom prepare for the wedding in the pale desert, a tale of unappeased desires; forbidden yearnings, and conflicted choices unfolds. Now, three lovers stand powerless before the true nature of man. Is fate unavoidable?

name: Orange
summary_text: A man, who doesn't believe that love can last a lifetime, pursues an exuberant romantic, but their clashing ideologies keep them apart.

name: Après Vous
summary_text: Antoine (Auteuil) saves Louis (Garcia) from hanging himself, though in his attempt to get Louis back on his feet, Antoine gets caught in a romantic triangle.

name: The FBI Story
summary_text: A dedicated FBI agent recalls the agency's battles against the Klan, organized crime and Communist spies.

name: Matriarch
summary_text: An expecting Mother (Rachel) and husband (Matt) crash their car in the countryside and are offered shelter by a farmer and his wife. Rachel soon realizes the farmer's children are in fact ...                See full summary »

name: Mike Birbiglia: My Girlfriend's Boyfriend
summary_text: Mike Birbiglia tells the touching story of his believing and disbelieving in love.

name: In Another Country
summary_text: A three-tiered story centered on a trio of French tourists visiting the same seaside resort.

name: Una pistola en cada mano
summary_text: A comedy centered on eight men in their 40s, all with identity crises.

name: Desh Drohi
summary_text: Raja arrives in Mumbai looking for a job but ends up killing the brother of a local drug dealer. Realising the corrupt nature of politics, he goes on a killing spree and kills ten people in 24 hours.

name: Lady in a Cage
summary_text: A woman trapped in a home elevator is terrorized by a group of vicious hoodlums.

name: Shadow People
summary_text: A radio talk show host unravels a conspiracy about encounters with mysterious beings known as The Shadow People and their role in the unexplained deaths of several hundred victims in the 1980s.

name: Pokémon: The Rise of Darkrai
summary_text: An idyllic town is thrown into chaos when two powerful Pokémon, Dialga and Palkia, cross paths and battle, distorting the dimensions of time and space. The only hope comes from Darkrai, a shadowy Pokémon shunned by the townsfolk.

name: The Invisible
summary_text: After an attack leaves him in limbo, invisible to the living and also near death, a teenager discovers the only person who might be able to help him is his attacker.

name: Looking for Alibrandi
summary_text: Alibrandi ultimately concerns a senior high school girl embracing her Italian heritage, but moving toward the less traditional Australian way of life. A wonderful cast who play their roles ...                See full summary »

name: Final Justice
summary_text: Homicidal sheriff Thomas Jefferson Geronimo is tasked with escorting a mobster to Malta. When the prisoner escapes, Geronimo goes to catch him.

name: Eureka
summary_text: In 1925, Arctic prospector Jack McCann (Gene Hackman) becomes a rich man when he strikes gold, but twenty years later, he faces major personal and family problems.

name: This Happy Breed
summary_text: Just after World War I, the Gibbons family moves to a nice house in the suburbs. They lead an ordinary life throughout the years, but everything changes when World War II breaks out.

name: From the Dark
summary_text: A couple on a trip through the Irish countryside find themselves hunted by a creature who only attacks at night.

name: Home from the Hill
summary_text: Dramatic story of the influential Hunnicutt family set in Texas during the late 1950s.

name: Primal Rage: The Legend of Konga
summary_text: A newly reunited young couple's drive through the Pacific Northwest turns into a nightmare as they are forced to face nature, unsavory locals, and a monstrous creature, known to the Native Americans as Oh-Mah.

name: X-Large
summary_text: Majdi is a young man who lives alone because of his obesity which kept him away from his friends. He gets into many situations that makes him uncomfortable, so he decides to ask his uncle for help.

name: Tale of the Mummy
summary_text: Centuries ago, under the sands of ancient Egypt, a Prince was buried and his tomb eternally cursed so that no man would ever again suffer from his evil ways. But hundreds of years later on ...                See full summary »

name: The War Lord
summary_text: In 11th century Normandy, a Norman duke sends one of his knights to build a defensive fortress in order to guard the borders against Frisian raiders.

name: Dulhan Hum Le Jayenge
summary_text: Sapna has lost her parents at an early age and lives with her three quirky uncles - Bhola Nath is a fitness freak, Prabhu Nath is a deeply religious fellow and Vicky Nath is a disco-savvy ...                See full summary »

name: Close My Eyes
summary_text: An estranged brother and sister begin an intense sexual relationship, behind the curtain of their otherwise normal working-class lives.

name: Providence
summary_text: A dying writer bases his last book on his own perception of his family.

name: She
summary_text: An Edwardian archaeologist and two companions stumble upon a lost city in East Africa, run by a beautiful queen whose love holds the promise of immortality.

name: Salvatore Giuliano
summary_text: The unclear and complicated twists between governal powers, independentist party and Mafia in the Sicily of the '40s culminate with the death of Salvatore Giuliano.

name: A Nice Girl Like You
summary_text: After being accused of being too inhibited by her ex-boyfriend, a violinist creates a rather wild to-do list that sends her on a whirlwind journey of self-discovery.

name: Babes in Toyland
summary_text: A young girl wakes up in the realm of Toyland, where she teams up with her family and friends to overthrow the evil villain, Barnaby.

name: Cannibals in the Streets
summary_text: Mentally unstable Vietnam vets who were held captive by the Vietcong come back to America after being rescued carrying a dangerous virus that turns people into cannibals when bitten.

name: Sex & Fury
summary_text: During the Meiji era, a gambler called Ocho takes revenge on three gangsters who killed her father, shelters a wanted anarchist and confronts a British spy.

name: The Baby
summary_text: A social worker, still reeling from the loss of her architect husband, investigates the eccentric, psychedelic Wadsworth Family, consisting of a mother, two daughters, and an adult son with the apparent mental capacity of an infant.

name: Redemption: The Stan Tookie Williams Story
summary_text: Redemption tells the story of Stan "Tookie" Williams, founder of the Crips L.A. street gang. Story follows his fall into gang-banging, his prison term, and his work writing children's ...                See full summary »

name: Cash Truck
summary_text: In France, the disturbed and mysterious Alexandre Demarre is hired as security guard for the Vigilante armored truck company earning 1,200 euros per month and lodges in a hotel nearby the ...                See full summary »

name: Carry on Jatta
summary_text: Jass falls in love with Mahie who wants to marry an orphan, so he lies to her and tells her he has no family, and finds himself in hilarious situations when he has to hide the truth once they get married.

name: Some Girls
summary_text: Michael flies up to French Canada to visit his girlfriend and her wacky family. She doesn't love him anymore, the grandma mistakes him for her late husband, the sister appears naked and makes advances, the dad likes to be naked as well.

name: Return to Horror High
summary_text: In the early 1980s, a series of gruesome murders occurred at Crippen High School. A few years later, a film crew uses the now-abandoned Crippen High as the set for a film. But an uninvited guest makes an appearance on the set.

name: Yuvarathnaa
summary_text: A reputed college that is now on the verge of closing due to the privatization of the education system and political reasons. The college Principal fights against privatization and the protagonist supports his vision.

name: Another Gay Sequel: Gays Gone Wild!
summary_text: Andy, Nico, Jarod and Griff reunite in Fort Lauderdale for Spring Break and participate in a contest called "Gays Gone Wild" to determine who can attain the most "buttlove" over the course of the vacation.

name: Raaz
summary_text: Sanjana and Aditya decide to give their marriage one last chance. They plan a holiday in Ooty, but they don't know that a strange figure is waiting for them to come.

name: Doug's 1st Movie
summary_text: Doug and his pal Skeeter set out to find the monster of Lucky Duck Lake.

name: Khal Nayak
summary_text: A prison guard goes undercover as a dancer to try and recapture an escaped criminal and restore her police inspector boyfriend's reputation.

name: At Midnight I'll Take Your Soul
summary_text: A gravedigger prowls the city in search of a female to bear him a son.

name: Yolki
summary_text: One of the biggest Russian hits in years, this epic comedy shows how the largest country on the planet can come together on New Year's. (Russian with English subtitles)

name: Tru Confessions
summary_text: Trudy Walker hated her life. She thought it was totally messed up until she found out about a contest that could change everything..

name: The Tales of Hoffmann
summary_text: A melancholy poet reflects on three women he loved and lost in the past: a mechanical performing doll, a Venetian courtesan, and the consumptive daughter of a celebrated composer.

name: Kurutta ippêji
summary_text: A man takes a job at an asylum with hopes of freeing his imprisoned wife.

name: Furious
summary_text: In the 13th century, an amnesiac soldier vows to get his revenge on the Mongol army that ransacked his village.

name: King Jack
summary_text: An underprivileged teenager bonds with his young cousin while facing off against a vicious bully.

name: Hellions
summary_text: A teenager must survive a Halloween night from Hell when malevolent trick-or-treaters come knocking at her door.

name: Miss Lovely
summary_text: A Hindi feature film set in the lower depths of Bombay's "C" grade film industry. Miss Lovely follows the devastating story of two brothers who produce sleazy horror films in the mid-1980s.

name: Trucks
summary_text: Aliens arrive, parking in a geostationary orbit over Nevada. Using powers unknown to us, they declare war, and use unmanned trucks as weapons.

name: Ethel & Ernest
summary_text: The life and times of the parents of the hailed British graphic novelist, Raymond Briggs.

name: A Call Girl
summary_text: Alexandra is a student from Krsko, a small town in Slovenia, while she studies the English language in Ljubljana, the capital of Slovenia. She has a plan to conquer the world. Working as a ...                See full summary »

name: House of Strangers
summary_text: After years in prison, Max promises revenge on his brothers for their betrayal. His lover Irene and memories of his past yield him a broader perspective.

name: Varathan
summary_text: After losing his job Abin along with his wife Priya, who has suffered a miscarriage, decide to shift from Dubai to Priya's family estate in Kerala. However, peace eludes the couple as they run into a set of new troubles.

name: A Woman, a Gun and a Noodle Shop
summary_text: The owner of a Chinese noodle shop's scheme to murder his adulterous wife and her lover goes awry.

name: Love at First Hiccup
summary_text: A high school romantic comedy about freshman Victor who has contracted a case of Anya-itis, (acute and incurable love passion for high school senior Anja.) And why shouldn't he?

name: La Pointe Courte
summary_text: Follow the story of a couple who goes to a small French fishing village to try to solve the problems of their deteriorating marriage.

name: Each Dawn I Die
summary_text: A corrupt D.A. with political ambitions is angered by news stories implicating him in criminal activity and decides to frame the reporter who wrote them for manslaughter in order to silence him.

name: Merry Kissmas
summary_text: A woman engaged to marry a self-centered film and stage director/choreographer falls for a caterer whom she kisses, as does he for her.

name: Charming
summary_text: Three fairy tale princesses find themselves engaged to the same guy, Prince Charming.

name: Midnight's Children
summary_text: A pair of children, born within moments of India gaining independence from Britain, grow up in the country that is nothing like their parent's generation.
After forsaking his family and religion, a husband finds his wife is demoniacally possessed.

name: Tatar Ramazan
summary_text: The story of a fearless man Tatar Ramazan who believes justice in his own way.

name: The Bad News Bears in Breaking Training
summary_text: A troubled, rebellious teen drives his rambunctious baseball team out to Houston where they play an exhibition game and the boy meets his estranged father, and hires him as the teams coach.
